    Overview

    PerronFrobenius.jl Documentation

    A package for computing invariant measures over partitioned phase spaces or state space reconstructions.

    This package implements the algorithms for estimating the transfer operator from an upcoming manuscript on transfer entropy computation using the transfer operator (Diego D, Haaga KA, Hannisdal B, Transfer Entropy computation using the Perron-Frobenius operator. In prep.).
